description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Imagine a game which is a connection of three gaming styles - Shooter, RPG and Puzzle. Enter the fantastic world of Slavonic creatures! Are you ready for a big journey?
